learner_management_enhancements.title: Learner Status Tracking System
learner_management_enhancements.description: Implement a comprehensive learner status tracking system for CIC (Currently in Class), RBE (Removed by Employer), and DRO (Drop Out) statuses.

subtasks.title: Implement status change dropdown in learner management interface
Add reporting functionality for status changes
Implement status-based access control to resources

comments:
Implement learner status system:
- CIC (Currently in Class): Active learner status
- RBE (Removed by Employer): Employer-initiated removal
- DRO (Drop Out): Learner-initiated withdrawal
Requirements:
- Status change dropdown in learner management interface
- Automatic status history tracking
- Status change notifications
- Reporting functionality for status changes
- Integration with class attendance tracking
- Status-based access control to resources

learner_management_enhancements.title: Level/Module Assignment Per Learner
learner_management_enhancements.description: Implement functionality to assign specific levels and modules to individual learners.

learner_management_enhancements.title: Automatic Level Progression
learner_management_enhancements.description: Implement automatic level progression for learners based on completed modules and assessments.

learner_management_enhancements.description: Integrate portfolio scanning functionality for digital document management.

learner_management_enhancements.title: Community Learner Handling
learner_management_enhancements.description: Implement special handling for community learners with different requirements and tracking.
